description: Using Exact Measure, you can specify any distance measurement in either Imperial units (feet, inches, yards, and miles) or Metric (millimeters, centimeters, meters, or kilometers).  That distance will be converted to the equivalent measure in the specified unit to 4 significant digits.  If you ask for Imperial units, you will also receive the full measure in miles, feet, inches, and fractions of an inch.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Exact Measure what is 67 centimeters in inches
Alexa, tell Exact Measure to Give me 73 feet in meters
Alexa, ask Exact Measure for 2 feet in millimeters
name: Exact Measure
shortDescription: Exact Measure converts distance measurements from Metric to Imperial and back again
